concept.title: 19.502-9 Withdrawing or modifying small business set-asides.

conbody.p: Record, or attach a memorandum for record to amend an existing DD Form 2579, the reasons for withdrawing an individual total or partial small business set-aside; andâ€”
(i) Submit the DD Form 2579 and attached memorandum, if applicable, to the small business specialist and SBA PCR for review (see FAR 19.502-9); and
(ii) Include the DD Form 2579 and attached memorandum, if applicable, documenting the decision to withdraw an individual total or partial small business set-aside in the contract file.
